section.p: Confirmation has been sent to email address .
To change your submission please use this page (this link is also available in confirmation email). Note that you can always use remind option on the main registraion page.
Your fee ( Euro) must be transfered, within 10 days from the registration, to the account:
owned by: Polskie Stowarzyszenie dla Maszyn Liczacych
in: Bank Zachodni WBK S.A. IV/O Wroclaw ul. Kuznicza 17/19 Wroclaw
Make sure your name appears on the bank transfer. The transfer must be free of charge for the beneficiary.
